IF(ISPICKVAL(Account__r.Primary_Business__c, "General Dry Freight"), "General Dry Freight", IF(ISPICKVAL(Account__r.Primary_Business__c, "General Freight"), "General Freight", IF(ISPICKVAL(Account__r.Primary_Business__c, "Hazardous Materials"), "Hazardous Materials", IF(ISPICKVAL(Account__r.Primary_Business__c, "Hazardous Products"), "Hazardous Products", CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field displays the value selected in the Primary Business field on the account
CustomField.label: Primary Business
